title: Rename Coaster 4C fleet entry to Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C and swap card image asset

requirements.summary: Update the existing “Toyota Coaster 4C” fleet entry so the Group & Commercial Transport card and booking dropdown show “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” and the card uses a new dedicated Saloon 4C image asset.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Fleet section under “Group & Commercial Transport”, the vehicle card currently showing “Toyota Coaster 4C” now shows the name exactly “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C”.
The card image for this vehicle loads from a new static asset path under /assets/generated (and is not reusing /assets/generated/car-coaster-4c.dim_1200x800.jpg).
The alt text for this card matches the updated vehicle name (via vehicle.name).
The booking form “Select Car” dropdown includes “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” (reflecting the updated fleet data).

file_operations.description: Add the new static generated image asset for the Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C (1200x800) per imageRequirements, so the fleet card can reference it via a /assets/generated/... path (no backend image routing).

Update only the existing group vehicle entry with id 'coaster-4c' to rename it to exactly “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” and change its image field to '/assets/generated/car-coaster-saloon-4c.dim_1200x800.jpg', ensuring no other fleet entries are altered and that the booking dropdown (which maps fleetData) reflects the updated name.
